org_midgardproject_projectsite_product.title: Midgard MVC
org_midgardproject_projectsite_product.content: <p>Midgard MVC is a web framework for PHP. Being a framework, it provides a standard way to build and deploy web applications. Your applications provide a set of interfaces that Midgard MVC calls when a matching HTTP request is made.</p><p>For serving the HTTP requests, Midgard MVC uses <a href="http://github.com/indeyets/appserver-in-php/wiki">an application server</a> written in PHP. This allows for persistence and advanced caching on the PHP level.</p><p>Midgard MVC can be used with the <a href="/midgard2/">Midgard2</a> Content Repository, but it also works without it.</p>
